result.execSummary:
All charges against Cody Michael Bui in this case have been dismissed. These charges were not proven and have no legal effect. Cody Michael Bui is presumed innocent.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

1:41 PM CO: SJN, RPR: V. Deiss, Clerk: K. Anderson, Attorney Michael Joseph Becker in court for State of Wisconsin, Defendant Cody Michael Bui in court, Attorney T. Gregory Amann in court for Cody Michael Bui. INCLUDES 22CF46 and 22CF119. ADA Becker recites agreement. DE pleads GUILTY to Ct 4 - Battery and Ct 6 - Criminal Damage to Property. DE sworn. Court reviews plea questionnaire and informs DE of rights. Court reads charge and maximum penalty. Attorney's stipulate to the facts. Court finds DE knowingly, intelligently and voluntarily waives rights and makes plea. Court accepts plea, finds factual basis and finds DE guilty of Ct 4 - Battery and Ct 6 - Criminal Damage to Property. On motion of the State without objection, Court dismisses Cts 1-3 and 5 in 22CF46 and 22CF119 in it's entirety. Sentencing arguments. Defendant advised of appeal rights. 

Court orders: 
22CF46
Ct 4 - Battery
S/W 18 months probation with conditions:
- Maintain absolute sobriety
- No contact with Alex B.
- AODA and follow any recommended treatment
- Court Costs $243; payable through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200; payable through Clerk of Court

Ct 6 - Criminal Damage to Property
S/W 18 months probation with conditions:
- Maintain absolute sobriety
- No contact with Alex B.
- AODA and follow any recommended treatment
- Court Costs $243; payable through Clerk of Court
- DNA Sample and Surcharge $200; payable through Clerk of Court

3 days jail credit.
Apply bond on file; payment plan approved to continue for balance.
Defendant to report to probation no later than 4:00 PM today.

Adjourned: 1:57 PM. kma

08:51 AM  CO: Nordstrand, RPR: Val Deiss, Clerk: K Kittel.   ADA:  Holly Elkin Rockow   DF ATTY:  T. Gregory Amann   DF:  Cody Michael Bui appeared.  INCLUDES:  22CF46 and 22cf119. Atty Aman notes new charge on 22CF119, court calls and holds  holds INIT; Court informs def of charges, possible penalties and rights. Def understands.  Waives reading. Waives speedy trial. Court sets further hearings.  Adjourned 8:56 am  Settlement conference scheduled for May 18, 2022 at 02:00 pm.  Pre-trial/scheduling conference scheduled for May 26, 2022 at 08:30 am.

Absolute sobriety:  Zero alcohol, zero controlled substances, zero prescribed medications (except as taken and prescribed for you by a physician) in your system, on your person, or in your possession at all times while this case is ongoing. This prohibition includes drug paraphernalia. Testing upon reasonable suspicion or at the Court's directive. All costs associated with testing shall be the responsibility of the defendant.

It is hereby ordered, as a condition of the defendant's bond/bail in the above-captioned case, that he/she have absolutely NO CONTACT whatsoever with the complaining witness, or with any of the following named persons and/or locations, Chloe A. Steele, or their residences.  The term "no contact" is hereby defined as no contact in person, by telephone, by way of electronic device, email, facsimile, social media including but not limited to texting, Facebook, Twitter, contact through the mail, and/or through a third person.  The aforementioned condition of bond/bail is set pursuant to Sec. 969.02(3)(d), Wis Stats.

If the defendant fails to comply with the conditions of his/her bond/bail that he/she may be charged with the offense of bail jumping.
